publishLabelOptions.displayName: requests.latency - P99 by user - Maximum by user
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.name: Rate of Errors
chart.programText:
A = data('traces.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api') and filter('sf_error', 'true')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = alerts(detector_id='FD68JlEAYAA').publish(label='B')

chart.name: Error Budget Burndown
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api') and filter('sf_error', 'true')).sum().sum(over='1h').publish(label='Failed Operations', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api')).sum().sum(over='1h').publish(label='Total Operations', enable=False)
ERROR_RATIO = ((A/B)*100).publish(label='Error Ratio', enable=False)
# Convert each error ratio to a binary value
VIOLATIONS = ERROR_RATIO.map(lambda x: 1 if x >= 5 else 0).sum(over='1d').publish(label='Violations', enable=False)
# Calculate a fixed value for the window
HOURS = const(1).sum(over='1d')
# Divide violations by hours, invert via subtraction from 1 and convert to %
RESULT = ((1-(VIOLATIONS/HOURS))*100).publish('Budget Remaining')

chart.name: Current Success Ratio
chart.programText:
A = data('traces.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api') and filter('sf_error', 'false')).sum().publish(label='Successful Operations', enable=False)
B = data('traces.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api')).sum().publish(label='Total Operations', enable=False)
C = ((A/B)*100).publish(label='Success Ratio')
D = alerts(detector_id='EW9l2laAcAA').publish(label='D')

publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.name: Error Budget Burndown
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api') and filter('sf_error', 'true')).sum().sum(over='1h')
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api')).sum().sum(over='1h')
ERROR_RATIO = ((A/B)*100)

# Convert each error ratio to a binary value
VIOLATIONS = ERROR_RATIO.map(lambda x: 1 if x >= 5 else 0).sum(over='1d')

# Calculate a fixed value for the window
HOURS = const(1).sum(over='1d')

# Divide violations by hours, invert via subtraction from 1 and convert to %
RESULT = ((1-(VIOLATIONS/HOURS))*100).publish('Budget Remaining')

chart.name: Latency per version
chart.programText:
C = data('requests.latency', filter=filter('user', '*') and filter('customer', 'Hooli'), rollup='latest', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).publish(label='C')
D = data('requests.latency', filter=filter('user', '*') and filter('customer', 'Acme Corp'), rollup='latest', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).publish(label='D')
E = data('requests.latency', filter=filter('user', '*') and filter('customer', 'Pied Piper'), rollup='latest', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).publish(label='E')

chart.name: Requests Processed vs Previous Week
chart.programText:
A = data('requests.processed', filter=filter('user', 'btubalinal@splunk.com'), rollup='latest', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=2).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('requests.processed', filter=filter('user', 'btubalinal@splunk.com'), rollup='latest', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=2).sum().timeshift('1w').publish(label='B')
C = (A-B).publish(label='C', enable=False)

chart.programText:
A = data('requests.latency', filter=filter('user', '*'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=180,rollup='rate').percentile(pct=99, by=['user']).max(by=['user']).publish(label='A')
B = events(eventType='canary push event').publish(label='B')

chart.description: Ratio of successes to total operations.
chart.name: Success Ratio
chart.programText:
A = data('traces.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api') and filter('sf_error', 'false')).sum().publish(label='Successful Operations', enable=False)
B = data('traces.count', filter=filter('sf_service', 'api')).sum().publish(label='Total Operations', enable=False)
C = ((A/B)*100).publish(label='Success Ratio')
D = alerts(detector_id='EW9l2laAcAA').publish(label='D')
